title: section 37 of the Social Welfare and Pensions Act 2007 (No. 8 of 2007)) of the
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Trust RACs (Registration)
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Trust RACs (Registration) 

(Amendment) Regulations 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited trust racs (registration) (amendment) regulation 2021

title: section 37 of the Social Welfare and Pensions Act 2007 (No. 8 of 2007)) of the
heading: 2. These Regulations and the Trust RACs (Registration) Regulations 2007
text_raw:
2. These Regulations and the Trust RACs (Registration) Regulations 2007 
shall be construed together as one and may be cited as the Trust RACs 
(Registration) Regulations 2007 to 2021. 

Amendments
text_norm: 2 regulation trust racs (registration) regulation 2007 shall construed together one may cited trust racs (registration) regulation 2007 2021 amendment

title: section 37 of the Social Welfare and Pensions Act 2007 (No. 8 of 2007)) of the
heading: 3. The Trust RACs (Registration) Regulations 2007 (S.I. No. 187 of 2007)
text_raw:
3. The Trust RACs (Registration) Regulations 2007 (S.I. No. 187 of 2007) 

are amended in Regulation 3 by – 

(a) 

(b) 

in sub-article (2), by the substitution of “60(2A)” for “60(2)”, and 

in sub-article (3), by the substitution of “1 month” for “12 
months”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

25 November, 2021. 

HEATHER HUMPHREYS T.D., 
Minister for Social Protection. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 30th November, 2021.

title: section 37 of the Social Welfare and Pensions Act 2007 (No. 8 of 2007)) of the
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend S.I. No. 187 of 2007 by amending the section of the 
Pensions Act 1990 referred to in Regulation 3(2) and by amending the period 
specified in Regulation 3(3) in which the trustees of a trust RAC are required to 
notify the Pensions Authority of changes to the information that has been 
provided to it for the purposes of registration under section 60 of the Pensions 
Act 1990. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [629]
